creator: Smart Apps (Photo Gallery, Editor, Collage Maker)
descriptionHtml:
PIP CAM - Photo Maker - Redefine the photo making and photo tacking with live PIP Camera {Picture In Picture}.

Pic Collage Photo Editor - The great selfie tool to puts your PIP {PIC Inside PIC} photo into another photo with special frames & brand new PIP photo editor. Photo Collage Editor to create PIP photo Collage Frame.

PIP CAM - Photo Maker allows to set photo inside photo with using creative photo frames & photo effects. PIP Camera selfie shooter will allows to set the photo inside PIP frames.

PIP CAM - Photo Maker to let's you create amazing PIP style photo editing using wide range of PIP frames, PIP Effects, PIP Camera filters with beauty photo editor. Pic Collage & Photo Editor to edit photo creatively and create the quick collages of your photos to share on social apps.

🎴 PIP CAM / Picture Inside Picture
You can take selfie directly or pick photo from the gallery with range of pip frames and layouts. PIP Camera photo maker will makes your photo artistic using different frames like photo glass, hand, selfie camera, mobile screen and more to get picture-in-picture effect.

🌺 PIP Photo Editor
Auto beautify & PIP photo editor to makes your photo more beautiful and remove the tons, darkness. Further you can edit the pic with using different tools like smoothing, toning, and also removing temporary imperfections such as pimples and blemishes for smoother and flawless skin. Add new pip camera frames, insert new colors, adjust brightness contrast, enhance the overall picture, and turn photos into art with PIP CAM - Photo Maker.

💮 PIP Photo Collage Creator
Create the collage frame photo instantly by just a one TAP using PIP Photo Collage Creator. Photo Collage is an simple and easy to use photo maker for the photo collections. No more efforts are required to create photo collage, Now newly designed photo collage Creator is available for free of use.

🤳 Selfie Beauty Photo Filters
To make your photo more cute and effective can apply the selfie beauty photo filters from our professional filters. Easily tap on any filter from the list and apply on your photo. The new selfie beauty photo filter is smooth, easy to use and more effective. Automatically beautify your face and give best effect for your face.

😎 Text Stickers & More
PIP CAM - Photo Maker contains the wide range of funny stickers and has various custom fonts to write on your photo. Stickers and text will help you out to show your emotions with the photo. On the celebration photo you can write tag your friends with funny stickers. PIP camera photo editor has online library to download more stickers.

📷 PIP CAM Library
PIP CAM has online showcase to download updated & trending data. PIP CAM library contains PIP Frames, Quick collage frames, backgrounds, stickers, patterns and many more. All the resources are freely available any time on PIP Camera photo editor dashboard without charge.

PIP CAM - Photo Maker is a free picture editing app which is fun and easy to use with multiple features like PIP CAM, PIP Style Photo Editing, Photo Collage Maker, Selfie beauty photo filter, PIP Photo Editing, Online Library for stickers and more. Download this amazing app for the fun with your photos.

Email : smart.93app@gmail.com
